steps.73: Microwave-Microwave for 3 minutes, stirring in between
steps.74: Add-Add 1/2 tbsp sweet and sour sauce to the bowl
steps.75: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 tbsp shredded cheddar cheese on top of the egg
steps.76: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well
steps.77: add-Extract and add contents of an egg to a microwave-safe bowl
steps.78: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to another into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.79: Pour-Pour egg mixture on top of the tortilla
steps.80: Add-Add 1 tbsp salsa to the bowl
steps.81: Place-Place 8 inch tortilla on a cutting board
